channel.title: Windows on 4ndr0 | Nas
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on 4ndr0 | Nas

item.title: Windows Utility Update
item.description: A big update with about 50 commits has made it to the May 2023 Windows Utility Update.

item.title: AME Wizard - The Future of Debloat?
item.description: I recently made a review of AtlasOS and what drove it is the AME Wizard made by a different entity. This overviews it and what it is and is NOT!

item.title: AtlasOS Review
item.description: I don’t review Custom ISO or Custom Windows. Anything that requires downloading ISO is an immediate red flag. AtlasOS takes a different approach using official Microsoft ISOs and modifying them using an open source tool.

item.title: Recovering Deleted Windows Boot Partition
item.description: Is your Windows boot partition missing? This guide fixes it!

item.title: Replace Google Fonts With Bunny Fonts
item.description: Did you know Google Fonts is bloated and can cause longer load times? Bunny fonts to the rescue!

item.title: Fix Windows Network and Sharing
item.description: Fixing problems with windows file sharing using the following methods.

item.title: How to Sync Local Files
item.description: A guide over how to set up Syncthing for local sync only.

item.title: Replace Windows Search
item.description: Everything Search is faster, more efficient, and a better Windows Search. This guide shows you how to setup everything and a toolbar for quick access.

item.title: Dism++
item.description: Dism++ enables users to modify Windows images before installing them, as well as providing tools to address and repair common issues like missing or corrupted files.

item.title: Ext4 in Windows
item.description: Pulling in EXT4 drives is easy now with Windows WSL2. There are a few tricks that you need to know about though!
